summary: INTERRIOR LIGHT FAILS TO GO OFF, EVEN WITH VEHICLE RUNNING.  ON ONE INSTANCE, IT BEGAN FLASHING.  THIS WAS VERY DISTRACTING AND DANGEROUS AS IT WAS AT NIGHT.  I WAS ONLY ABLE TO TURN THE INTERIOR LIGHT OFF BY PULLING THE RELAY.  THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE WITH 1999-2000 EXPEDITIONS, BUT APPARENTLY IT AFFECTS 1998 VEHICLES AS WELL.
